abstract: Idriss Carlos Kameni (born 18 February 1984) is a Cameroonian professional footballer who plays for Málaga CF in La Liga, as a goalkeeper.He spent the vast majority of his career in Spain, namely with Espanyol, with which he appeared in 229 official games over the course of eight La Liga seasons.A Cameroonian international before he was 20, Kameni represented the country in two World Cups and five Africa Cup of Nations tournaments.
